textAfterTable: 5 Songs Customer Reviews Too bad we only get the "single version"           by Cebuano Steve G I'm glad to see that England Dan & John Ford Coley have finally arrived in the iTunes music store. However, I notice my two favorite songs, "It's Sad to Belong..." and "Love Is the Answer" are specified as "Single Version." If longer versions of these songs exist, I hope the music store can somehow make them available in the future. I feel that we are being short-changed when this Hi-Five album only provides the "AM radio" versions. Single version           by Ribeye Lover Fear not, I don't think you are being short-changed with the "single version".
